span.span: RAS believes in educating and tending to the whole child. In the heart of our vision, "To empower all student learners to become educated and productive citizen leaders of the world," we understand the importance of ensuring that our students are exposed to many different opportunities and experiences both in and out of the classroom.
At Richard Allen, students learn the importance of a strong academic foundation that is grounded in the core principles of character, leadership, and service.
We invite you to schedule your personal RAS tour today where we sow seeds of knowledge and grow trees of wisdom.
COME SOW AND GROW WITH US!
118 W. 1ST STREET, SUITE 620, DAYTON, OH 45402 PHONE: (937) 221-9405
